HugsLib.UpdateFeatureDef.content: Update which adds Royalty and other mod integration to the mod and rebalances some implants. | |Release Notes: - Noble Wimps are now guaranteed have a Guidance Chip implanted in them, so if you want to quickly acquire a decent psycaster at the cost of angering the Empire you can simply reprogram them. - Stellarchs are now guaranteed to have a Guidance Chip implanted in them. - Cataphracts are now guaranteed to have a Null Chip implanted in them. - All other empire pawns will now randomly have Null and Guidance implants in their brains. - Guidance implant no longer blocks inspirations. - Null implant now improves combat abilities slightly. - Increased chance of failure on chip removal. - Made Fractured Mind increase forget speed significantly and Cognitive Rewiring increase forget speed slightly. - Basic EPOE and RBSE Integration. - Improved C# code
